item.title: Personal history of ||kabbo
item.summary: The names of ||kabbo's (Jantje Toorm's) mother (|koi ang) and some of his other relations. The piece includes details of his personal history and upbringing.
item.comments: 1) Note on the inside of the back cover of this notebook: 'Finished correcting Sept 15/71 from Jantje Toorm himself', 2) This story is found in Book II-1
item.author: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
